price: 63. Zij zeiden: “Nee, wij zijn tot jullie gekomen met dat waarover zij twijfelden.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ جِئۡنَٰكَ بِمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal ji'nāka bimā kānū fīhi yamtarūna
